description.value:
Type: Campaign

Campaign Setting: Scales of War Adventure Path

You've always had a knack for mercantile affairs, and nothing pleases you more than a deal that's profitable for you-and good enough for the other party that he comes back for more. Is there a particular trade or commodity that you're expert at doing business in? Who gets you your goods, and to whom do you sell? Who are your business partners? Investors? Rivals?

Good Background: Half-elf.

Benefit: Learn an extra language of your choice, add Insight to your class skill list, and you gain a +2 bonus to Insight checks.

Published in Dragon Magazine 366, page(s) 56.
